content: I did checkoff for pset 3 and 4 this afternoon but on the scores page it still shows that "no checkoff received" for both pset3 and 4. Would this get fixed later? Thank you!
subject: Pset 3&4 Checkoff

content: Do you remember who the TA/LA was that gave you the checkoff?

I don't remember his name but he told me that the scores page was refreshing very slowly and I should check the page half an hour later to make sure I receive the score. If not he recommended me to post on Piazza for help. I did the checkoff at around 5:40pm.

@Muhammad Ashhad Alam 

hassan_m gave the checkoff according to the logs.
